subject: Mental Health
title: Panic Disorder
description: A short lesson to help you apply Panic Disorder.

hook.text: Your heart pounds, you can't breathe, and you're convinced you're dying.

buildup.text: A panic attack strikes without warning and peaks within minutes.

discovery.text: Panic disorder means the fear of another attack becomes constant.

twist.text: People start avoiding places where attacks happened, shrinking their world.

climax.text: The attacks aren't dangerous, but the brain records them as life-threatening.

punchline.text: The fear of fear becomes the real enemy.

quiz.question: What defines panic disorder beyond having panic attacks?
